fields.title: player
fields.description: A player name `string` or [`target selector`](https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/documents/commandsintroduction#target-selectors) to identify the player.

fields.title: sound
fields.description: A `string` from the sound `enum` of the sound to stop.

overloads.title: Stop sound
overloads.description: Stop a sound for a `player` with an optional `sound` `string` .
